bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a feeling of abdominal lumps and bi jing 閉經 , blocked menstruation, resulting from an internal stagnation of blood flow. SWBJQYBMJ Last juan Recipe Entry hong hua san 紅花散 , powder with hong hua : 月事不調，遠年乾血氣，皆治之 , “When the monthly affair is irregular, and if [a woman has suffered from] desiccated blood and qi for many years, all this is cured by it”.
